column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We then ordered the beef Benedict and sausage-fried paella rice and 3 sides (bacon-wrapped dates
column3: and spicy potatoes). Everything arrived in a timely manner and they tasted great. I really liked the bacon-wrapped and the sausage-fried paella rice. The Benedict was okay
column4: but it wasn't as great as the other dishes.
